definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Mr. Yamasaki became interested in architecture after his mother's brother came for a visit.
sentences.chinese: 山崎實在舅舅的一次來訪之後開始對建築產生興趣。

sentences.english: Masako starts to live with Yamazaki, but Kato goes to his house to pick Masako up.
sentences.chinese: 雅子開始生活在山崎，但加藤去他家接雅子。

sentences.english: Minoru Yamasaki was a leading architect for 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 山崎實是一位叱吒30多年的建築大師。

sentences.english: Minoru Yamasaki is known for design that is simple, strong and filled with light.
sentences.chinese: 山崎實設計而聞名，簡單，強大和充滿光。

sentences.english: Mr Yamasaki died of cancer in 1986.
In the nineteen-fifties, Minoru Yamasaki began to experience bleeding in his stomach.
sentences.chinese: 在上世紀50年代，山崎實開始體驗到他的胃部出血。

sentences.english: Mister Yamasaki became interested in architecture after his mother's brother came for a visit.
sentences.chinese: 山崎先生產生興趣後，他母親的哥哥架構來進行訪問。

sentences.english: Minoru Yamasaki was born in Seattle, Washington in 1912.
sentences.chinese: 山崎實1912年出生於華盛頓的西雅圖。

sentences.english: Interestingly, Minoru Yamasaki was very fearful of heights.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，山崎實本身畏高。

sentences.english: In the 1950s, Minoru Yamasaki began to experience bleeding in his stomach.
sentences.chinese: 在上世紀五十年代，山崎實開始胃出血。

definition: Koizumi (name)/KOIZUMI Jun'ichirō, Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2001-2006
